heroHeader: Transforming good intentions into tangible impacts.
heroParagraph: At Food on Every Table, we believe in the power of generosity and financial sustainability. Join us in building a community that empowers non-profit organizations to thrive while offering individuals the opportunity to earn while making a difference. Together, let's create a brighter future.

header.class: text-red-700 text-4xl mb-4 font-extrabold leading-none tracking-tight text-gray-900 dark:text-white

artifacts.text: At Food on Every Table, we believe in the power of community and technology coming together to make a difference. Join us in our mission to combat hunger and provide food for those who need it most in Africa.

content.title: Our Mission
content.text: Food on Every Table is an initiative by Food on Every Table NPO, dedicated to eradicating hunger in Africa. We believe that no one should go to bed hungry, and we're committed to making a positive change.

Subscribe to Food on Every Table and become part of our community of change-makers. By subscribing, you not only help us manufacture food bars but also participate in distributing them to the most vulnerable communities across Africa.

elements.title: Impact
elements.text: Your subscription directly translates into meals for those in need.

elements.title: Transparency
elements.text: We offer complete transparency in our operations

elements.title: Community
elements.text: Join a passionate community of individuals dedicated to ending hunger in Africa.

content.title: Get Involved
content.text: Ready to make a difference? Join us today by subscribing to Food on Every Table. Together, we can turn the tide against hunger in Africa.

content.title: Subscribe Now
content.text: By subscribing to Food on Every Table, you not only provide sustenance but also hope to those who need it most. Join us in our mission to put food on every table in Africa.

artifacts.title: Feeding Hope in Africa
artifacts.text:
Our story at Food on Every Table began in the aftermath of the Covid pandemic when a group of compassionate individuals, dismayed by the growing hunger crisis in Africa, took action. Starting the non-profit 'Food-On-Every-Table' we sought financial support from companies to address the urgent issue of hunger. However, the response was dishearteningly silent, prompting us to reassess our approach. 

 Recognizing the economic challenges faced by businesses, coupled with South Africa's staggering 40% unemployment rate, we understood the need for a sustainable solution that addressed both hunger and unemployment. Moreover, as we delved deeper into the philanthropic landscape, we realized that other noteworthy causes were grappling with similar funding challenges. 

 In response, we developed a unique vehicle at Food on Every Table, offering a means for anyone with a worthy cause to generate income, creating a versatile platform that empowers diverse initiatives. Out of this realization, Food on Every Table emerged â€“ a dynamic solution uniting non-profits and individuals, fostering a community where support and financial sustainability converge to create meaningful change. Our journey reflects the resilience born from adversity, as we strive to make a lasting impact on the lives of those facing hunger, unemployment, and a shortage of funding for their noble causes.

artifacts.title: Our Story
artifacts.text: Food on Every Table was born from a deep sense of responsibility and a shared commitment to address one of the most pressing challenges facing Africa - hunger. Our journey began in 2018, when a group of compassionate individuals decided that we can no longer stand by while fellow Africans go to bed hungry. From those early days, Food on Every Table has grown into a beacon of hope, serving as a symbol of unity, compassion, and resilience. Our journey is marked by unwavering dedication to our cause.

artifacts.title: Our Mission
artifacts.text: At Food on Every Table, we believe that no one should endure the pain of an empty stomach. Our mission is clear - to provide nourishment to those in need and to restore hope in the hearts of the underserved.

artifacts.title: What We Do
artifacts.text: Food on Every Table is more than an initiative; it's a lifeline. We work tirelessly to produce nutritious food bars, but our mission extends beyond that. We make it our duty to ensure that these life-saving resources reach the farthest corners of Africa. With a dedicated team and trusted partners, we are making a tangible difference every day.

artifacts.title: Our Values
artifacts.text: At Food on Every Table, our values serve as our guiding light. They include 'compassion,' 'transparency,' 'collaboration,' and these principles underpin everything we do. We take pride in our commitment to complete transparency in our operations, ensuring that every contribution makes a meaningful impact.

artifacts.title: Meet Our Team
artifacts.text: Our success is a testament to the dedication and passion of our team. Meet the individuals who drive Food on Every Table forward, from our founders to our committed volunteers. Together, we share a common goal - to eradicate hunger in Africa and to bring hope to those who need it most.

artifacts.title: Join the movement
artifacts.text: Food on Every Table is more than an initiative; it's a movement of compassion, driven by the belief that change is possible when people come together. Whether you're interested in subscribing, volunteering, or partnering with us, we invite you to be a part of our journey.

artifacts.title: Ending Hunger in Africa
artifacts.text: At Food on Every Table, our cause is simple yet profound - to end hunger and bring sustenance to the people of Africa. Discover why our mission matters, the challenges we face, and how you can be a part of the solution.

artifacts.title: The Challenge
artifacts.text: Hunger in Africa is a pressing and complex issue. Despite the continent's abundant resources, millions of people go to bed hungry every night. The causes are numerous, including poverty, food scarcity, conflict, and inequality. We believe that addressing hunger is not just a moral imperative but also essential for the progress and well-being of the entire continent.

artifacts.title: Why Our Cause Matters
artifacts.text: Human Dignity: Hunger robs individuals of their dignity. We believe that every person, regardless of their circumstances, deserves the basic human right of access to nutritious food. Community Resilience: When communities have access to consistent nourishment, they become more resilient and better equipped to overcome other challenges they face. Health and Education: Adequate nutrition is the foundation for good health and educational attainment. By eradicating hunger, we open doors to a brighter future for generations to come. Sustainable Development: Addressing hunger is a crucial step towards achieving the United Nations Sustainable Development Goal of 'Zero Hunger'.

artifacts.title: Our Approach
artifacts.text: Food on Every Table takes a holistic approach to tackling hunger in Africa. We are committed to: Producing Nutritious Food Bars: We produce high-quality food bars that serve as a convenient and nourishing source of sustenance for those in need. Distribution: Our dedicated team and partners ensure that these food bars reach the most vulnerable and remote communities across the continent. Transparency: We are committed to complete transparency in our operations and how your contributions are used.

artifacts.title: Join Us in the Fight Against Hunger
artifacts.text: Our cause is a call to action. Hunger in Africa is a complex issue, but it is one that can be solved with your support. By subscribing, volunteering, or partnering with Food on Every Table, you become part of a movement to end hunger and bring hope to the people of Africa.

artifacts.title: Make a Difference Today
artifacts.text: Your support can change lives, one meal at a time. Join us in the fight against hunger in Africa and be a part of a brighter future for all.
